sentence.Network_en: And if it is a despot you would dethrone.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果是暴君,你会罢黜他.

sentence.Network_en: Make suggestion on the stock of slacken, over stock and dethrone. Destroy it after approved.
sentence.Network_cn: 对公司呆滞物资 、 超储物资、废旧物资等及时提出处理建议,待批准后组织实施.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语前缀 - 搜搜百科 ... from 等搭配，例如： dethrone （废黜） deport （驱逐出境）.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... deplane 下飞机 dethrone 使离王位 derail 使(火车)脱轨.
废_百度百科 ... 停止； 中止[ stop] 废黜，罢官[ oust;dethrone] 衰败；败坏[ decline].
英语单词的重要前缀 - . . d d - 博客频道 -... ... recommend （推荐） dethrone （罢免） deport （驱逐出境）.

list.exp: 引爆 起爆 爆炸
list.abs: ...detestation dethrone 推翻废黜撵走失势轰下台dethronement detonate 引爆起爆爆炸detonatation
dethroned king had flown the country ., 被推翻的国王逃到国外去了.
they dethroned the last emperor .他们罢免了最后一个皇帝。
...下台 be driven out of office; be forced to step down把国王赶下台 dethrone a king总统快下台了。The president will soon leave office.

entry.def: If a king, queen, or other powerful person is dethroned, they are removed from their position of power.

example.ex: He was dethroned and went into exile.
example.tran: 他遭到废黜并流亡国外。

means.word_mean: 1. remove a monarch from the throne;

sentences.sentence: "If the King does not abdicate, he will have to be dethroned"

auth_sentence.content: The Maoists fought a decade-long civil war trying to dethrone the king.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Maoists fought a decade-long civil war trying to dethrone the king.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Maoists fought a decade-long civil war trying to dethrone the king.

auth_sentence.content: Dewey's effect on schooling was to dethrone subject matter and replace it by techniques.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dewey's effect on schooling was to dethrone subject matter and replace it by techniques.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dewey's effect on schooling was to dethrone subject matter and replace it by techniques.

auth_sentence.content: One of his main tasks will be keeping an eye out for any serious attempts to dethrone Mr Cameron.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of his main tasks will be keeping an eye out for any serious attempts to dethrone Mr Cameron.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One of his main tasks will be keeping an eye out for any serious attempts to dethrone Mr Cameron.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去"等; 2. 表示"使……成为,加强"等

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+struct结构+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: de使……成为,加强+fin界限+ition表名词→划出界限→定义
de使……成为+sign标志→使……成为标志→设计
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+celer速度+ate表动词→使速度变慢
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+code密码→去掉密码
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+fame名声→名声变坏→诽谤
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+forest森林→去掉森林
de去掉+lete→v.删除;擦掉
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+mobilize动员→反过来动员→复员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 剥夺……的国籍;解除国有化
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+nationalize国有化→v. 剥夺……的国籍;解除国有化
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+press压→向下压→压制
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+salt盐→去掉盐分
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+throne皇冠→去掉皇冠→退位
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+train火车→v.下火车
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+value价值→去掉价值
de使……成为,加强+limit限定→加强限定
de使……成为,加强+line线条+ate表动词→划线条→描画[轮廓]
de使……成为,加强+nude裸体的→成为裸体
de使……成为,加强+pict描画→成为画图→描绘
de使……成为,加强+sicc干+ate表动词→弄干
de使……成为+sign标志→使……成为标志→设计
